trophies.trophyDetail: Congratulations! You have done it!

Congratulations on making a solid investment and earning some interest! By depositing such a large amount of money, you have established yourself as a serious player in the financial world. Keep up the good work and continue to expand your wealth.

You've proven yourself to be a master of deception and theft! By taking over a gas station, you have shown that you are willing to do whatever it takes to gain control and power in the city. Use this momentum to continue to assert your dominance over the other sectors.

You've made your mark on the housing market and secured some prime properties! By investing in residential real estate, you have established yourself as a player in the property market. Use your new properties to generate income and expand your influence in the city.

You've shown your ruthless side and taken over some major corporations! By using your cunning and deception, you have seized control of some of the biggest companies in the city. Keep up the good work and continue to dominate the business world.

You're expanding your influence and gaining a foothold in a new sector of the city! By investing in a new sector, you are opening up new opportunities for yourself and solidifying your hold on the city. Use this momentum to continue to grow your influence and power.

You're well on your way to becoming a wealthy and powerful leader! By accumulating such a large sum of money, you have established yourself as a serious player in the game. Keep up the good work and continue to build your wealth and influence in the city.

You're building a financial empire and making sure your money is well-protected! By depositing large sums of money in multiple banks, you have diversified your investments and made yourself even harder to topple. Keep up the good work and continue to expand your financial empire.

You've disrupted the city's manufacturing industry and asserted your dominance! By taking over a factory, you have shown that you are willing to do whatever it takes to control the city's resources. Use your new factory to generate income and continue to expand your power.

You've unlock the Generation 3 Branch encompasses transformative initiatives aimed at enhancing various sectors crucial to our country's development. From healthcare to education, infrastructure to sustainability, these policies prioritize the needs and aspirations of our citizens.

You've amassed an impressive portfolio of residential properties! By investing in multiple properties, you have established yourself as a major player in the city's property market. Use your new wealth to expand your influence even further and control even more sectors of the city.

You're dominating the city's business landscape and leaving your competitors in the dust! By taking over multiple companies, you have cemented your position as the top player in the business world. Use your new companies to generate even more wealth and power.

The world of corrupt politics is your oyster, and with one million dollars in your pocket, you can afford to buy whatever you want. Congratulations on unlocking a new sector and expanding your sphere of influence!
Money talks, and with one million dollars in your bank account, you're speaking volumes. Keep up the good work and who knows how far you'll go.
Congratulations on amassing an impressive fortune and putting one hundred thousand dollars into ten different banks. You're well on your way to becoming a financial titan in this corrupt city.
Sometimes the best way to corrupt the system is to change it from within. By implementing your own presidential reform, you've ensured that your influence will be felt for years to come.
You didn't just steal any old building, you managed to pull off the heist of the century and steal a stadium. The city is in awe of your criminal prowess.

The lights may be on in the city, but that's only because you haven't decided to shut them off yet. Congratulations on stealing an electric station and gaining even more control over the city's infrastructure.
With twenty residential properties under your belt, you're quickly becoming the go-to person for anyone looking to buy or sell in this corrupt city.
Ten was just the beginning. With twenty successful company thefts, you're now a true corporate raider and one of the most feared names in the city.
You've done it! By unlocking two additional sectors with investments of fifty million dollars respectively, you've solidified your position as a major player in the city's corrupt economy.
Money may not buy happiness, but it certainly buys power. Congratulations on accumulating one hundred million dollars and becoming one of the wealthiest and most influential people in the city.
